accessToken.title: Facebook Access Token
accessToken.description: Facebook user access token with 'ads_read' permission. Get one at: https://developers.facebook.com/tools/explorer/ — select your App, click 'Generate Access Token', add permission 'ads_read'.

search.title: Search keyword
search.description: Keyword to search for ads (e.g. 'cirurgia plástica').

country.title: Country
country.description: Two-letter country code (e.g. BR, US, GB, PT).

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of ads to scrape. 0 means unlimited.

customData.title: Custom data
customData.description: Free-form JSON object passed through to every output record. Useful for identifying the scrape job when chaining actors.
